(1627x243+287)/64 mod 1024 = 38. (1627x243+287)/128 mod 512 = 19. (1627x729+989)/256 mod 256 = 29. (1627x2187+3223)/512 mod 128 = 44. (1627x2187+3223)/1024 mod 64 = 22. (1627x2187+3223)/2048 mod 32 = 11. (1627x6561+11717)/4096 mod 16 = 1. (1627x19683+39247)/8192 mod 8 = 2. (1627x19683+39247)/16384 mod 4 = 1. (1627x59049+134125)/32768 mod 2 = 0.
